name: Haneefa Nagar Masjid
description: Haneefa Nagar Masjid, located in Kanyakumari district, is a cherished Islamic center known for its community spirit and serene atmosphere. It serves as a place of worship and cultural exchange, fostering unity through religious education, community events, and spiritual gatherings among its worshippers.
location: Paal Pannai (Kanya Milk), HANEEFA NAGAR, Kottar-Parvathipuram Rd, next to AAVIN, Nagercoil, Tamil Nadu 629001
